Template & Studio


Common Studio Settings
Left Panel

1 min
this tab enlists all the settings related to the left panel elements display them, hide them and change their sort order you also get to set the display style i e the sort order of the shapes falling under the clipart and shapes tab we have also introduced the option to show/hide the left panel, this will help whenever your customer thinks that the left panel is covering a larger part of the designer studio customers can just hide it with a click and continue customizing a template in a broader area
Did this page help you?
